availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Graduate of Cincinnati Law School in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1836. Attorney in Newport, Kentucky, from 1836. Mayor of Newport from 1855 to 1856. County Judge in Newport in 1861.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 44A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 616.
Law Department of the University of Cincinnati: The Cincinnati Law School, (University of Cincinnati Law Department, 1904), 10.
